channel.title: welcome on Siziksu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in welcome on Siziksu's Blog

item.title: Welcome post
item.description: Well, this is my first blog. I always wanted to have one, but you know, never is the right moment to sit down and spend some time writing. Finally, I decided to do it. Maybe I’m aging and slowing down my pace of life a bit … anyways, I hope you’ll find here some useful posts. class SiziksuBlog : HugoBlog { private val posts = ArrayList<Post>() val count: Int get() = posts.
